## Dashboard Examples

This repository contains different types of Quarto dashboards:

- [Static Dashboard](static_dashboard/demo_dashboard.qmd): A non-interactive dashboard with visualizations
- [Interactive Dashboard](shiny_dashboard/shiny_dashboard.qmd): A Shiny-powered dashboard with real-time filtering and updates

### Running the Dashboards

1. Static Dashboard: Can be viewed directly through the website
2. Interactive Dashboard: Must be run locally using:
   ```bash
   quarto serve shiny_dashboard/shiny_dashboard.qmd
   ```
